hu.vadasz.peter.knockmessenger.Activities

Class KnockGraphActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • AppCompatActivity
      • hu.vadasz.peter.knockmessenger.Activities.BaseActivity
        • hu.vadasz.peter.knockmessenger.Activities.KnockGraphActivity

  • public class KnockGraphActivity
extends BaseActivity
    This class visualizes the strength of the knock with a graph based on the set values (short unit time, level). The graph is animated. Graph View: http://www.android-graphview.org
